org.shared.net.nio

Class NioConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.net.nio.NioConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Future<NioConnection>, EnumStatus<NioConnection.NioConnectionStatus>, EnumType<SourceType>, Source<NioEvent<?>,SourceType>, SourceLocal<NioEvent<?>>, SourceRemote<NioEvent<?>>, Connection, SocketConnection

    public class NioConnection
extends Object
implements SocketConnection, EnumStatus<NioConnection.NioConnectionStatus>, Source<NioEvent<?>,SourceType>, Future<NioConnection>
    An abstract asynchronous sockets class internally managed by NioManager. Instantiating classes must implement callbacks for receipt of data, connecting, accepting, and error handling.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NioConnection.NioConnectionStatus
      An enumeration of connection states.
      protected static interface  NioConnection.WriteHandler
      Defines a handler for outgoing data.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.shared.net.Connection

      A NioConnection.WriteHandler that forgets all data offered to it.

      A NioConnection.WriteHandler used when bytes can be written through directly to the underlying transport.

        A bit flag indicating that the connection has been closed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • bufferedHandler

        protected final NioConnection.WriteHandler bufferedHandler
        A NioConnection.WriteHandler used when writes are deferred. Enqueues data without further action.

      • writeThroughHandler

        protected final NioConnection.WriteHandler writeThroughHandler
        A NioConnection.WriteHandler used when bytes can be written through directly to the underlying transport.

      • nullHandler

        protected final NioConnection.WriteHandler nullHandler
        A NioConnection.WriteHandler that forgets all data offered to it.

      • deferredHandler

        protected final Runnable deferredHandler
        An internal handler for deferred writes.

        protected final Runnable closingHandler
        An internal handler for connection closure.

             int bufferSize,
             NioManagerThread thread)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        handler - the ConnectionHandler for callbacks.
        bufferSize - the network buffer size.
        thread - the NioManagerThread with which this connection will be registered.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public int send(ByteBuffer bb)
        Description copied from interface: Connection
        Sends data to the remote host.
        Specified by:
        send in interface Connection
        Parameters:
        bb - the ByteBuffer containing data. It must be in ready-to-read mode.
        Returns:
        the number of bytes remaining in this connection's write buffer; is greater than 0 if and only if not all bytes could be written out to the network, and have to be stored locally for the time being.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(Connection.OperationType type,
              boolean enabled)
        Description copied from interface: Connection
        Enables/disables various managed operations:
        • Connection.OperationType.READ -- The ConnectionHandler.onReceive(ByteBuffer) callback is enabled/disabled. With argument true, this method shall guarantee that ConnectionHandler.onReceive(ByteBuffer) will subsequently be called at least once.
        • Connection.OperationType.WRITE -- Managed writes of data buffered by the Connection.send(ByteBuffer) method are enabled/disabled.
        Specified by:
        setEnabled in interface Connection
        Parameters:
        type - the Connection.OperationType.
        enabled - whether the given operation is enabled or disabled.
        See Also:
        Connection.OperationType

      • isManagerThread

        public boolean isManagerThread()
        Description copied from interface: Connection
        Gets whether this connection's ConnectionManager thread is the current thread.
        Specified by:
        isManagerThread in interface Connection
        Returns:
        true if and only if this connection's ConnectionManager thread is the current thread. Note: All code where this test returns true are thread-safe with respect to callbacks.
        See Also:
        Thread.currentThread()
